title: Following Directions
description: Students read and follow directions at school all day long, but many children don't really know why! This book describes different ways students can follow directions and why it is so important. From writing their names to filling in circles, following directions can help students show what they know. Following Directions helps build readers' confidence through the use of predictive text and detailed photographs. This book can be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge and identify main ideas and details in a book.
